name: Comb-Slime
description:
Comb-slime is a game about two slimes who just want to eat a good meal!

Fuse together to become stronger and fling each other around to solve puzzles and reach the apples!!

This game can be played local co-op or alone. You use one keyboard:

- WASD for player 1

- Arrow keys for player 2

When both player touch they combine becoming one player. In this mode use:

- D and Right to move right

- A and Left to move left

- W and Down or S and Up to split upwards

- A and Right or D and Left to split sideways

THIS GAME IS VERY MUCH IN THE PROTOTYPE STAGE SO BUGS ARE PRESENT IF ANY ARE ENCOUNTED USE:

- R to restart the level 

- ESC to quit the game

To install this game simply download, unzip the files and load up the application. I hope you enjoy and I look forward to hearing any feedback
